title: At the supermarket
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Retail trade - Vocational guidance
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Home economics - study and teaching
description: Episode of Series "People Who Help Us". Non-narrated. Shows us some of the people who help run a supermarket. Apart from the familiar helpers such as checkout cashiers, and sales assistants we also see people who prepare meat and vegetables for sale, those who order and take delivery of stock and night fillers.
